argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | nfdfat.1 | |- F/_ x F |
| 2 |  | nfdfat.2 | |- F/_ x A |
| 3 |  | #P_df-dfat | |- ( F defAt A <-> ( A e. dom F /\ Fun ( F |` { A } ) ) ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_nfdm | |- F/_ x dom F |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_nfel | |- F/ x A e. dom F |
| 6 | 2 | #P_nfsn | |- F/_ x { A } |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_nfres | |- F/_ x ( F |` { A } ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_nffun | |- F/ x Fun ( F |` { A } ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_nfan | |- F/ x ( A e. dom F /\ Fun ( F |` { A } ) ) |
| 10 | 3, 9 | #P_nfxfr | |- F/ x F defAt A |
